<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120271</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120271</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Plošček, drseč  na  zračni blazini, trči v drug plošček</string>
            <string language="en">A puck sliding on an air table collides with another puck</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Kobold, der auf eine Lufttabelle schiebt, 
stößt mit einem anderen Kobold zusammen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un galet glissant sur une table d'air se heurte 
un autre galet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um puck que desliza em uma tabela do ar colide 
com um outro puck</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un disco di gomma che fa scorrere su una tabella 
dell'aria si scontra con un altro disco di gomma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σφαίρα που γλιστρά σε έναν πίνακα αέρα 
συγκρούεται με μια άλλη σφαίρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un duende malicioso que resbala en un vector del 
aire choca con otro duende malicioso</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Plošček, ki se giblje enakomerno, prožno trči v plošček, ki je preko žice povezana na os.</string>
            <string language="en">A puck that is attached by a string to a fixed axis is hit by another puck that was traveling with constant speed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ohranitev energije</string>
            <string language="en">conservation of energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vrtenje</string>
            <string language="en">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Kobold, der durch eine Zeichenkette zu einer 
örtlich festgelegten Mittellinie angebracht wird, wird durch einen 
anderen Kobold geschlagen, der mit konstanter Geschwindigkeit reiste.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un galet qui est attaché par une chaîne de 
caractères à un axe fixe est frappé par un autre galet qui 
voyageait avec la vitesse constante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um puck que seja unido por uma corda a uma linha 
central fixa é batido por um outro puck que esteja viajando com 
velocidade constante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un disco di gomma che è fissato da una stringa 
ad un asse fisso è colpito da un altro disco di gomma che stava 
viaggiando con velocità costante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σφαίρα που συνδέεται από μια συμβολοσειρά με έναν
σταθερό άξονα χτυπιέται από μια άλλη σφαίρα που ταξίδευε με τη 
σταθερή ταχύτητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un duende malicioso que es asociado por una 
cadena a un eje fijo es golpeado por otro duende malicioso que viajaba
con velocidad constante.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieeinsparung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umdrehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">économie d'énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">conservation de energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rotação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">conservazione di energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rotazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συντήρηση της ενέργειας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιστροφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">conservación de la energía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rotación</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
